###### # Create Session 

<h1 align="center"> 
Create Session с предварительной настройкой
</h1>

<div align="center">
  <img style="width: 90%; height: auto;" alt="CreateSession" src="./media/Tutorial/Article_2/CreateSession.png"/>
</div>

<details> 
    <summary> ⚙️ Развернуть описание </summary>

```
ServerName
```

```
ServerMap
```

```
GameMode
```

</details>

###### # PlayerName PlayerNickname

<h1 align="center"> 
PlayerName | PlayerNickname
</h1>

</div>

<details> 
    <summary> ⚙️ Развернуть описание </summary>

```sh
HOSTING MATCH
```

```sh
CLIENT
```

```sh
SOLO PLAY
```

</details>
